title: Mini-Ep 170: Invest In Yourself
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 170: Invest In Yourself
itunes:subtitle: Doree’s husband unexpectedly tests positive for COVID, and Kate looks for ways to start the morning warm and satiated. Then, listeners offer thoughts about women and money, skincare for pre-teens, and setting digital boundaries. Activity of ...
description:
Doree’s husband unexpectedly tests positive for COVID, and Kate looks for ways to start the morning warm and satiated. Then, listeners offer thoughts about women and money, skincare for pre-teens, and setting digital boundaries.

 

Activity of the Week: Figure out a way to virtually engage with friends.


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

 

PAPIER - Visit papier.com and use code FOREVER35 for 15% off today. 

 

  • BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.
  • TRADITIONAL MEDICINALS - Use code EVER20 for 20% off at traditionalmedicinals.com.
  • MASTERCLASS - Visit masterclass.com/forever35 for 15% off the Annual All-Access Pass.
  • SQUARESPACE - Head to Squarespace.com/FOREVER35 and use the offer code FOREVER35 to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain.
  • FLEUR & BEE - Head to fleurandbee.com and use code FOREVER35 to get 25% off.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
